name: Weapons Party
description:
Play Weapon Party for Free !

Gameplay:
- Create a team or play solo. Participating in the match, players start with their fists. During each certain period of time, the weapon will drop on the map. Players pick up weapons to enhance their character's skills/stats. Each weapon will have a unique index and skill system. Take advantage of it to win.
- Players can buy clothes and hair from the rewards received after each match.
- Win more to increase your rank, compete with other players.

Form your team, join the fight. Welcome to "our Party"!
